message: Let's be fair and start with 60-40, I'm open to negotiations!
Let's try a bit more in my favor, 55-45 is still quite fair!
Let's meet in the middle of our previous offers, 57-43 is a good compromise!
Getting closer! 52-48 is a fair compromise, don't let the inflation eat our money!
Inflation is biting, let's settle on 56-44, it's better for both of us than going further!
